entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text:
@NYGovCuomo And YOU,

Don't kill another 6,000 seniors, through mismanagement again.

Let's hear you pledge to not place COVID-19 infected patients in nursing homes, like you did the last time.

And don't try to shift the blame with lying.

You're responsible, Lurch. 
No one else...
